!M=9,d=17 constitution and citizenship day

fifty five hundred years since the dark millennium
just focus on what you can do today/to prepare yourself for tomorrow
one day you'll be far past this day/and you'll wonder why you were ever worried
the best day of your life is the day that/you decide that your life is fully your own/this is the day your life really begins
